comments.author: Pat Machin
comments.content: Looks as if you are having fun!  Any idea when it will be released on this side of the Atlantic?

comments.author: Nilam
comments.content: what a delight to follow along with you! Excellent write-up and pics! Can't wait to pick up my copy!

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: To the best of my knowledge it should be in bookstores in the UK now. If you don't find it, you'll be doing me a favor if you ask - it will be good for booksellers to know there is demand. Thanks, Michael.

comments.author: Pat Machin
comments.content: Amazon.co.uk say release date is 13 September.  Have put it on my wish list :-)

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I'll look into this, I can't imagine why it should be so much later! Seems like a mistake.

comments.author: Linda
comments.content:
We enjoyed meeting you in Austin and hope to see more of you in the future! Here are the pictures I took at Natural Epicurean, you are welcome to snag copies of the ones you want! Thanks for the very tasty food!

http://plantbasedplanet.blogspot.com/

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Those are great, thank you for sharing! You guys at NE are a really cool group.

comments.author: Pat Machin
comments.content: I'll check most days and let you know when it appears.

comments.author: Jackie @ The Beeroness
comments.content: I had a great time at the Culver City event! So great to meet you and now all I can think about it sautéing grapes.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Thanks, Jackie! I was just checking out your blog, your photos are gorgeous,  and the flavor pairings sound great.

comments.author: indigo
comments.content: omg I'm on the blog! Great to see you at the beginning of your tour! I've been reading the book -- so fabulous, as I knew it would be of course :)

comments.author: Mike Lyons
comments.content: Thanks for stopping over in Austin, Michael. Enjoyed the demonstration at The Natural Epicurean.
